CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New setting enables meeting participants to move between breakout rooms
CurrentVersion.description: Now, meeting organizers can make the list of breakout rooms visible to all meeting participants and allow them to choose which room to join. Enabling this setting in breakout rooms allows participants to move freely from one room to another, simplifying breakout room coordination for meeting organizers and participants.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New setting enables meeting participants to move between breakout rooms
OldVersion.description: Now, meeting organizers can make the list of breakout rooms visible to all meeting participants and allow them to choose which room to join. Enabling this setting in breakout rooms allows participants to move freely from one room to another, simplifying breakout room coordination for meeting organizers and participants.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: New SharePoint Start
CurrentVersion.description: New SharePoint start experience aims to inspire content creators to use their platform. By emphasizing a user-friendly approach that minimizes clicks, it's now easier to create websites, pages, news, and intranet content. Creators can return to the start experience hub to refine drafts, review past work, and monitor engagement metrics

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: New SharePoint Start
OldVersion.description: New SharePoint start experience aims to inspire content creators to use their platform. By emphasizing a user-friendly approach that minimizes clicks, it's now easier to create websites, pages, news, and intranet content. Creators can return to the start experience hub to refine drafts, review past work, and monitor engagement metrics

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
CurrentVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection
OldVersion.description:
Adaptive Protection is a capability of Microsoft Purview that dynamically assigns appropriate Data Loss Prevention policies to users based on the risk levels analyzed by the machine learning models in Insider Risk Management. 

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
CurrentVersion.description:
This roadmap item is cancelled. We apologize for any inconvenience.
To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
OldVersion.description: To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Mobile – In-app Contact Editor
CurrentVersion.description: This update implements a new contact editor experience, replacing the use of the native device experience. This gives users the ability to create and edit their contacts with a 1st Party form in Outlook mobile.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Mobile – In-app Contact Editor
OldVersion.description: This update implements a new contact editor experience, replacing the use of the native device experience. This gives users the ability to create and edit their contacts with a 1st Party form in Outlook mobile.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Change history reports
CurrentVersion.description: Create custom reports to monitor changes made to the SharePoint configuration across various levels of your organization. Review CSV reports of site actions or organization setting changes made within the last 180 days.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Change history reports
OldVersion.description: Create custom reports to monitor changes made to the SharePoint configuration across various levels of your organization. Review CSV reports of site actions or organization setting changes made within the last 180 days.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: In Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP), auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
OldVersion.description: In Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP), auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Mute user for network
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, Engage admins can remove specific users' posts from the Engage home feed, storylines feed, and all email digests. Selected users are not notified about this change. 
Engage admins may find this feature helps to moderate the visibility of content in the network. Mute user for network is part of a suite of moderation features in Engage, including view-only mode, close conversations, and more.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Mute user for network
OldVersion.description:
With this feature, Engage admins can remove specific users' posts from the Engage home feed, storylines feed, and all email digests. Selected users are not notified about this change. 
Engage admins may find this feature helps to moderate the visibility of content in the network. Mute user for network is part of a suite of moderation features in Engage, including view-only mode, close conversations, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Time Suggestions Update
CurrentVersion.description: We are improving how suggested times are shown when scheduling a meeting. We are removing the automatically shown suggested times and instead you will need to enable a switch - Find a time - if you want to see suggested times. If you enable the toggle, the new availability view on time suggestion tiles will make it easier to find a suitable time with more clarity on everyone's availability. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Time Suggestions Update
OldVersion.description: We are improving how suggested times are shown when scheduling a meeting. We are removing the automatically shown suggested times and instead you will need to enable a switch - Find a time - if you want to see suggested times. If you enable the toggle, the new availability view on time suggestion tiles will make it easier to find a suitable time with more clarity on everyone's availability. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Copilot in Microsoft Teams chat and channels to summarize content over a specified period of time
CurrentVersion.description: You can now ask Copilot in chat and channels to respond to questions regarding a conversation in a specific time period, for example: last month.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Copilot in Microsoft Teams chat and channels to summarize content over a specified period of time
OldVersion.description: You can now ask Copilot in chat and channels to respond to questions regarding a conversation in a specific time period, for example: last month.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Quick Links Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature helps tenant admins add a card with a list of curated quick links for users on the Viva Connections Dashboard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Quick Links Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
OldVersion.description: This feature helps tenant admins add a card with a list of curated quick links for users on the Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Playlist Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows tenant admins to create a card for a playlist to be accessed from the Viva Connections Dashboard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Playlist Card on Viva Connections Dashboard
OldVersion.description: This feature allows tenant admins to create a card for a playlist to be accessed from the Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Planner: Recommended Plans
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new Recommended view in Planner in Teams to help you discover plans with tasks assigned to you that you haven't viewed yet, enhancing task management efficiency and providing seamless prioritization of your workload.

OldVersion.title: Planner: Recommended Plans
OldVersion.description: We are introducing a new Recommended view in Planner in Teams to help you discover plans with tasks assigned to you that you haven't viewed yet, enhancing task management efficiency and providing seamless prioritization of your workload.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
OldVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: Resize columns in Grid view
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing column resize control in Microsoft Planner. Now you can tailor your view by adjusting column widths, giving you the flexibility to focus on the details that matter most.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Planner: Resize columns in Grid view
OldVersion.description: Introducing column resize control in Microsoft Planner. Now you can tailor your view by adjusting column widths, giving you the flexibility to focus on the details that matter most.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Enhancing SharePoint document translation with glossary feature
CurrentVersion.description: We’re thrilled to announce the addition of a glossary capability to our SharePoint AI content document translation model. This feature delivers precise, industry-specific translations, fostering unparalleled clarity and consistency for your documents. Experience effortless integration and user-friendly operation within your existing SharePoint libraries.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Optical Character Recognition (OCR) on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: Purview policies like Data loss prevention (DLP) auto labelling can scan for sensitive content in most of the textual files, but images are not supported for content scanning today on Mac endpoint devices. We are adding OCR support on Mac endpoints to detect sensitive content in images and apply policies to protect these images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention- Network Share Coverage and Exclusion Support on Mac Endpoints
CurrentVersion.description: With this feature, Sensitive data in files that are stored in network shares and mapped network drives will be protected by DLP policies across Mac endpoints as well.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance: Recommended policy scope
CurrentVersion.description:
Leverage policy scope insights to understand the aggregated volume of policy violations that are missed from users that are not currently scoped into the policy. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide
